get.summary: Get All attendances. Permission required = attendance.list
get.description:
* This endpoint retrieves attendance records based on the user's role:
 * Tenants: View their own attendance and their company's employees.
 * Companies: View attendance of their employees only.

post.summary: Mark a new attendance. Permission required = attendance.store
post.description:
Attendance can be marked by:
 *     Tenant: Input fields are required for tenant-marked attendance.
 *     Company: Input fields are required for company-marked attendance.
 *     Employee: If an employee is marking attendance, no input is needed. Attendance is automatically
 *     recorded twice a day: once for check-in and again for check-out, according to the current time.

employee_id.description: The name of the attendance => required

check_in.description: The check_in time of the attendance => required and the accepted format is 10:00 PM

check_out.description: The check_out time of the attendance => required and the accepted format is 10:00 PM

type.description: The type of the attendance => nullable, only accepted are late,absent,present,leave

reason.description: The reason of the leave,late or absend and its value should only be filled if the type is late,absent or leave  => nullable

post.summary: GET The Employee. Permission required = attendance.store
post.description: This endpoint retrieves a specific employee by providing their Emirates ID.

emirates_id.description: The Emirates ID of the employee (required)

get.summary: GET The attendance. Permission required = attendance.edit
get.description: This endpoint retrieves a specific attendance by providing its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the attendance

patch.summary: Update the attendance. Permission required = attendance.update
patch.description: Only the tenant and the company can update attendance, and they can only update attendance records that were created on the same day as the update.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the attendance to be updated

employee_id.description: The name of the attendance => required

check_in.description: The check_in time of the attendance => required and the accepted format is 10:00 PM

check_out.description: The check_out time of the attendance => required and the accepted format is 10:00 PM

type.description: The type of the attendance => nullable, only accepted are late,absent,present,leave

reason.description: The reason of the leave,late or absent and its value should only be filled if the type is late,absent or leave  => nullable

post.summary: GET The Employee.Permission required = attendance-report.list
post.description: This endpoint gives a specific employee. You just need to enter the emirates id of the employee, and it will return you the employee.

post.summary: GET attendance-periodic-report.Permission required = attendance-report.list
post.description: This endpoint get  attendance-periodic-report.

from_date.description: The date from which you want to start the report => required and its format should be yyyy-mm-dd

to_date.description: The date to which you want to end the report => required and its format should be yyyy-mm-dd

employee_id.description: the id of the employee for which you want to get the report

post.summary: GET attendance-daily-report.Permission required = attendance-report.list
post.description: This endpoint gets attendance-daily-report.

date.description: The date of the attendance-daily-report => required and its format should be yyyy-mm-dd

get.summary: Get All attendance-rosters.Permission required = attendance-roster.list
get.description: This endpoint retrieves information about something.

post.summary: create a new attendance roster. Permission required = attendance-roster.store
post.description:
You need to give the employee_id for one time. Then give all fields in the JSON form in the attendance.
     *

employee_id.description: The id of the employee that is needed to assign to the roster (required)

roster_json.description: All the remaining fields will come under the roster_json like in the example in the json form

check_in.description: The check_in time of the employee

check_out.description: The check_out time of the employee

holiday.description: If the specific day is a holiday then check this checkbox and leave the check_in and check_out fields null or empty. If the box is checked the input will be sent from the frontend as '1' if not checked then input will be sent as '0' from frontend side

date.description: The date for which you are defining the roster (required)

get.summary: Get All days .Permission required = attendance-roster.create
get.description:
This endpoint retrieves all days of the current month for the logged-in tenant. It indicates which days are defined as holidays by the tenant.
     * 1. This endpoint provides all the days of the current month and indicates which days are defined as holidays by the tenant.
     * 2. For holidays, the input fields (check_in and check_out) should be disabled, and by default, the holiday flag (holiday = 1) is set, leaving check_in and check_out as null.

get.summary: GET The attendance-roster.Permission required = attendance-roster.edit
get.description: This endpoint Gives a specific  attendance-roster.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the attendance-roster

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the attendance-roster to be deleted

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the attendance-roster to be updated

employee_id.description: The id of employee that is needed to assign to the roster  =>(required)

check_in.description: The entry time of the employee

check_out.description: The check_out time of the employee

holiday.description: If the specific day is a holiday then check this check box and leave the check_in and check_out fields null or empty

date.description: The date for which u are defining the roster => required
